CHAT.comment: The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:04 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF STEPHEN B. KINNAIRD ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MICHAEL R. DREEBEN ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING AFFIRMANCE
ORAL ARGUMENT OF WM. ROBERT LONG, JR. ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF STEPHEN B. KINNAIRD ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:05 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
